While we're at it...  have you noticed the barrage of Scottish Government branded advertising on social media?   There is even one advising citizens to go out for a walk!  Does it serve a useful purpose or is the main motivation to present the...

urgent public safety advice around meeting others over the festive period‚Äù. The advice in the card was in fact just the usual stuff, said many times before, with no relevance to omicron in particular.
